授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn how to write different kinds of paragraphs in a competent manner.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the different components of a solid paragraph, and be able to write their own paragraphs, while developing their own ideas.
授業の概要・背景: This year 2024, classes will be conducted on campus and face to face.
授業方法: Students will be given tasks which will harness their interests and allow them to write about them. Though we will use a text in the classroom, students will have plenty of freedom to choose their own topics while completing the tasks.

第1回: Class policy, goal and interview with teacher
トピック.授業外学習2: Students must complete all homework assignments they are given which will be determined on the given class day.

成績評価Grading1: The student's grade will be based on quizzes, writing assignments, and oral presentations. No final exam will be given during the exam period. Those students who miss five or more classes during the term will receive 0 points for this course
